imdb.title: The Russell Andersen Files: The Hidden Valley of Slow Motion
plot: Our world is slowed down, frame by frame to reflect on small but effective moments - In which showcase an inner unpredictable beauty. This is the universe of Slow Motion and life of famous meteorologist Russell W. Andersen.::Morten K. Vebjørnsen
